text: Lance Robertson is the singing actor best known for the Nick Jr. kids' TV show "Yo Gabba Gabba!". He was born in St. Louis. He's based in Los Angeles. He plays DJ Lance Rock, a musician with an orange hat, who makes his 5 colorful toy monster pals come to life with magic - including Muno, the red cyclops; Foofa, the pink flower bubble; Plex, the yellow magical robot; Brobee, the green little broccoli/bee forest creature; and Toodee, the blue dragon-cat, who live in a 4-landed magical place called Gabbaland. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Monster Mash-Ups - article on the creation of Yo Gabba Gabba Category:Living people Category:African-American actors Category:Actors from St. Louis, Missouri Category:American DJs Category:Musicians from St. Louis, Missouri Category:1965 births Category:African-American musicians Category:American television actors
title: Lance Robertson
